org.openimaj.audio.util

Class BasicMusicTimekeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.util.BasicMusicTimekeeper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, TimeKeeper<MeasuresBeatsTicksTimecode>

    public class BasicMusicTimekeeper
extends Object
implements TimeKeeper<MeasuresBeatsTicksTimecode>
    A timekeeper that generates MeasuresBeatsTicksTimecodes that allow the position within a music score to be tracked.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • supportsPause

        public boolean supportsPause()
        Returns whether the timekeeper supports pausing. If the timekeeper supports pausing then a stop() followed by a run() will continue from where the timekeeper was paused. Use reset() inbetween to force the timekeeper to start from the beginning again.
        Specified by:
        supportsPause in interface TimeKeeper<MeasuresBeatsTicksTimecode>
        Returns:
        TRUE if the timekeeper supports pausing.
        See Also:
        TimeKeeper.supportsPause()
